items.sentence: I think it\'s unlikely that Tom will get back in time for supper.
I would\'ve read that book if Tom had told me it was interesting.
I\'d rather have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
If you don\'t have money with you today, you can pay me tomorrow.
What kind of music do you like to listen to when you\'re driving?
Apparently, Tom was already famous before he released that album.
It\'s hard for me to understand French when it\'s spoken quickly.
It\'s normal to feel nervous when you don\'t know what to expect.
Can you just tell me now, so I don\'t have to come back tomorrow?
Did Tom say he didn\'t think it was a bad idea for us to do that?
